sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndamcalres ( orgnzt_id , expert_id , knwldg_ty_code , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , atch_file_id , parnts_knwldg_id , answer_dp , answer_ordr , answer_group_no , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , knwldg_id ) VALUES ( #orgnztId# , #expertId# , #knwldgTyCode# , #emplyrId# , #knwldgNm# , #knwldgCn# , #atchFileId# , #parntsKnwldgId# , #answerDp# , #answerOrdr# , #answerGroupNo# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #knwldgId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndamcalres SET orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , expert_id = #expertId# , knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , knwldg_nm = #knwldgNm# , knwldg_cn = #knwldgCn# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , parnts_knwldg_id = #parntsKnwldgId# , answer_dp = #answerDp# , answer_ordr = #answerOrdr# , answer_group_no = #answerGroupNo# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , knwldg_id = #knwldgId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_id = #knwldgId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndamcalres WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_id = #knwldgId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT orgnzt_id , expert_id , knwldg_ty_code , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , atch_file_id , parnts_knwldg_id , answer_dp , answer_ordr , answer_group_no , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , knwldg_id FROM comtndamcalres WHERE knwldg_id = #knwldgId#

SELECT orgnzt_id , expert_id , knwldg_ty_code , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , atch_file_id , parnts_knwldg_id , answer_dp , answer_ordr , answer_group_no , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , knwldg_id FROM comtndamcalres WHERE 1=1
orgnzt_id = #searchKeyword#
expert_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY knwldg_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndamcalres WHERE 1=1
orgnzt_id = #searchKeyword#
expert_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
